Active Planned Care / GoalsStart DateReason
Diabetes self management plan29-Aug-2006Prediabetes
  • Maintain hemoglobin A1c below 5.7% to reduce risk of diabetes progression.
  • Achieve and maintain a 5% reduction in body weight to improve metabolic syndrome and prediabetes.
  • Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg to reduce cardiovascular risk.
  • Maintain LDL cholesterol below 100 mg/dL to reduce cardiovascular risk.
Lifestyle education regarding hypertension07-Apr-1981Essential hypertension (disorder)
  • Patient will achieve and maintain target blood pressure through lifestyle education and interventions for hypertension.
  • Patient will achieve weight reduction as part of lifestyle modification for hypertension management.
  • Patient will engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity physical activity per week to support blood pressure control.
  • Patient will reduce dietary sodium intake to recommended levels to support blood pressure control.
Immunization RecommendationDue DateReason
Vaccine product containing only Influenza virus antigen (medicinal product)01-Oct-2025Annual seasonal influenza vaccination
